name: modis_landcover_51
title: MODIS Land Cover (GLCF, Version 5.1)
description: Standard MODIS land cover type data product (MCD12Q1) in the IGBP Land Cover Type Classification.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.categorical: categories based on IGBP Land Cover Type Classification. Warning: provides 19 category columns for each year selected
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Friedl, M.A., D. Sulla-Menashe, B. Tan, A. Schneider, N. Ramankutty, A. Sibley and X. Huang (2010), MODIS Collection 5 global land cover: Algorithm refinements and characterization of new datasets, 2001-2012, Collection 5.1 IGBP Land Cover, Boston University, Boston, MA, USA.
